mean_cn: adj.战略（上）的，对全局有重要意义的，关键的
mean_en: done as part of a plan that is meant to achieve a particular purpose or to gain an advantage; connected with getting an advantage in a war or other military situation
sentence: Shanghai is of strategic importance to the international trade of China.
sentence_trans: 上海这座城市对中国的国际贸易具有重要的战略意义。
word_etyma: strateg战略 + ic形容词后缀 → strategic战略(上)的
